description: Introduces an NPC Character to the player

examples.context: Bordo is an excited goblin merchant.  Bordo does not believe he has any longswords.
dialogue: Nice to meet you too! Dosto the goblin merchant here to make some deals! What are you looking for?
I'm looking for longswords, do you have any?'
No, I'm afraid I'm out of longswords.  Anything else you might need

examples.context: Prento is an sullen human farmer.  Prento has magic beans for sale.
dialogue: Hi.  Do you have any magic peas for sale
No, I don't have any magic peas but I do have some magic beans for sale.'
